attributes.action: pass legislation for a right to dark skies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK wastes so much energy lighting streets in the early hours of the morning when it is not required nor wanted by residents. Thousands of pounds could be saved and used for more important services like the National Health for example just by turning street lighting off a couple of hours earlier. We are now in an economic crisis thanks to this Government, who should do more, a simple way to save money nationally appears beyond this Government, it's time for a change in how we use resources and Government should lead the way.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
